welcome_message_body: Welcome to West Covina! Known for its small-town charm and vibrant community, we invite you to explore our beautiful city and enjoy all it has to offer. Whether it's our local shops, delicious dining options, or our stunning parks, we hope you have a wonderful time here.

restaurants.name: El Pescador
restaurants.description: El Pescador is a mexican restaurant located in West Covina.
restaurants.address: 1125 W West Covina Pkwy (at Fashion Plaza Way), West Covina, CA 91790
